dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DEADPOOL, in full DRESS REDS and MASK, quietly FIDGETS in BACK SEAT of a TAXI CAB as it proceeds along a CITY FREEW Deadpool adjusts the two KATANAS strapped to his back. Ro the WINDOWS up, down, up. Tries futilely to untwist the seatbelt, then LUNGES forward, locking it up. Rifles thro a tourist booklet and tears out a HAUNTED SEGWAY TOUR cou The CABBIE, young, thin, brown, glances back and forth fr the rear view to the road to the rear view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kinda lonesome back here. CUT TO: DEADPOOL, WEDGING himself through the opening between the back seat and front. His two katanas don't cooperate, catching on the Plexiglas, stalling him mid-to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Little help? The cabbie grabs Deadpool's hand and pulls him through to front. Deadpool's head rests upside down on the bench sea as he maneuvers his legs through. The cabbie turns the helping hand into a HANDSHAKE, then turns down the Juice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dopinder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (still upside-down)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pool. Deadpool. Dopinder is remarkably UNAFFECTED by the lunatic in his c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why the fancy red suit, Mr. Pool?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's like Christmas Day, Dopinder. Been waiting one thousand eight hundred twenty- two days, three hours... (checks `Adventure Time' watch)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and thirty-six minutes for this shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: DEADPOOL turns himself RIGHT-SIDE-UP in the front seat. H is YOKED to the gills and ARMED to the teeth. TWIN KATANA TWIN DESERT EAGLE .50 CALIBER PISTOLS. Deadpool grabs Dopinder's OPEN BAG of CORN NUTS. Dopinder isn't quick enough to stop him. Deadpool gazes out the window onto the city - a teeming, sooty urban sprawl that looks almost... pre-post-apocalyptic. Deadpool turns up his MASK. Dopinder catches a GLIMPSE of the bottom of a SCARRED face. And quickly looks AWAY. Deadpool eats the CORN NUTS. CRUNCH. CRUNCH. Points.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice. Dopinder eyes his DAFFODIL DAYDREAM AIR FRESHENER and tak deep breath through his nose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smells good, no?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not the Daffodil Daydream.      The girl. A PICTURE of a young INDIAN WOMAN is taped to the dash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah yes. Gita. She is quite lovely. She was supposed to make me a very agreeable wife. Mom and Dad chose her rather excellently. But Gita's heart has been stolen by my cousin Bandhu. Bandhu is as dishonorable as he is attractive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dopinder, I'm starting to think I'm in this cab for a reason.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you hailed it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, my slender brown friend... to give you one crucial piece of advice: Love... is a beautiful thing. When it finds you, the whole world smells like Daffodil Daydream. Deadpool's own heartbreak is palpable.        He takes an deep, cleansing BREATH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So hold onto love tight. Go at Bandhu hard. Get Gita back. Or else... the whole world will taste like Mama June after hot yoga.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And how does Ms. Mama June taste?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like two hobos making love under a drizzle of Limburger- I could go all day like this. Point is, bad. Deadpool chucks the bag of Corn Nuts into the back seat a pulls out his PISTOLS. He starts CHAMBERING shells into t magazines. Suddenly, he frantically pats himself down, like a Hollyw agent who can't find his phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shiiiit. My extra mags! I usually leave them right by the door so I'll trip over them! Someone must've moved them...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A blind late-70's AFRICAN-AMERICAN WOMAN in a purple flor dress enters the front door, falls as she trips over an ` *HEART* HELLO KITTY' DUFFEL BAG of AMMUNITION, PICKS it U and CARRIES it OFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shall we turn back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No time. Not today. (slides in last bullets)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten, eleven, twelve... or bust. (chambers a shell into each gun, looks up)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right here! The cab SCREECHES to a stop on the shoulder of the highes FREEWAY in a massive INTERCHANGE of freeways. Dopinder ha the meter and hands Deadpool his CARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My card.    That's $27.50.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooo. I never carry a wallet when I'm working. Ruins the lines of my suit. How 'bout a crisp high five? Dopinder stares as he and Deadpool slap skin.        Dead OUT of the cab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be sure to... ask for me again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I owe you one. Merry Christmas, Dopinder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And a convivial... Tuesday in April to you, Pool... Guy. Deadpool closes the door with a flourish.         Boom.

dialogues.speaker: EXT./INT.
dialogues.text: A bone-white ISLAND PRISON, affectionately nicknamed `The Raft,' looms ominously in a CITY HARBOR. Etched in helvetica into the prison wall: `No punishment ever possessed enough power of deterrence to prevent the commission of crimes.' - Hannah Arendt. Below it, GRAFFIT in RED SPRAY PAINT: `Until NOW' The prison's FRONT DOORS OPEN, and out steps a handcuffed PRISONER, 30's, ORANGE JUMPSUIT, broad shoulders, whip-sm tightly coiled, with cool, dead-blue eyes. BURLY GUARDS guide him across a CAUSEWAY toward a CONVOY of Escalades Ducatis on shore. The middle Escalade's door opens.       The prisoner stop guards unlock his CUFFS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're someone else's problem now. The ex-prisoner STRETCHES his arms and strides TOWARD the convoy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.   I.   Am. CUE SALT & PEPA'S `SHOOP:'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DEADPOOL sits on the edge of the highest freeway on the overpass, legs dangling over the side like Huck Finn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I get some fries with that shake- shake boobie? If looks could kill you would be an uzi. Deadpool is using some broken CRAYONS to draw something o scrap of paper. REVERSE ANGLE to REVEAL a childish drawin of Deadpool SHOOTING another man in the head, brains blow out. The victim's thought bubble reads: `OUCHIE!!!'       Even the mask, Deadpool looks pleased by this. He turns to CAMERA:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, hello, Deadpool here. You may be wondering whose balls I had to fondle to get my own movie. Rhymes with `Polverine.' Couple'a smooth criminals. (ALT:)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a word, gorgeous. (ALT:)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surprisingly little hair down there. (ALT:)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a jungle down there. (ALT:)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thick underbrush. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyway, I smell Oscar. The suit's gonna match the carpet. Now... places to be... faces to fix... bad guys to kill... ANGLE ON a distant BIRD'S EYE VIEW of the freeway interchange: an interwoven tangle of ramps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AJAX, 30's, dead-blue eyes, broad shoulders, whip-smart, tightly coiled stands at ease on a cracked and blistered tarmac. Behind him, a HEAVILY ARMED CONVOY OF DUCATIS and ESCALADES. FOUR LARGE ALUMINUM CARGO CRATES sit beside hi Ajax squints into the sun as A BELL HELICOPTER thrashes t air above him, kicking up dust as it lands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.text: A SERBIAN WARLORD, mid-50's, sharply dressed, armored BRIEFCASE in hand, climbs out. He is surrounded by ARMED GUARDS. The Warlord places the BRIEFCASE on the FOREMOST CRATE. A pops the case... to find STACKS upon STACKS of THOUSAND DOLLAR BILLS. Satisfied, he closes the briefcase and hand it to one of his men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (bangs crate)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They won't disappoint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They'd better not.    And next month's shipment?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There won't be one. Demand is high. You aren't the only one with a war to win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (steps forward)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That won't do. Both sets of armed thugs shift to ready positions. Ajax smiles calmly, but his free hand DARTS OUT and CASUA LIFTS the warlord into the air by the THROAT. Fingers fin triggers on both sides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's been a small... disruption in our supply chain. We'll deliver in full the following month. Say, ten percent off for the inconvenience? The Warlord manages to nod in acquiescence.       Ajax sm again, lowers him gasping to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We appreciate your business. Ajax spins and walks purposefully toward the line of wait SUV's. The warlord angrily motions for his men to begin loading crates into the helicopter, which they do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sotto voce)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fucking mutant.

dialogues.text: Behind him the convoy of SUV's and motorcycles pull out, falling into line as they accelerate past the rows of derelict aircraft.

dialogues.text: DEADPOOL watches as the convoy approaches. He CASUALLY ge up as if standing up out of an easy chair...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

We're now OUTSIDE the Escalade, seeing the driver's expression take on a ridiculous silly-putty-esque grimace pain every time it's MUSHED into the glass. The man in back scrambles forward. The CIGARETTE LIGHTER POPS OUT. Deadpool YANKS the EMERGENCY BRAKE. The man in back LAUNCHES forward and SMACKS the DASHBOARD. Deadpool STABS the now ORANGE-HOT lighter into the man's forehead, burning the COIL PATTERN into his skin. The man SCREAMS.

dialogues.text: The man hollers in muffled agony. A MOTORCYCLE has pulled AHEAD of the ESCALADE and now sits, STOPPED, in its path. The helmeted RIDER OPENS FIRE with a SUB-MACHINE GUN. Deadpool has one hand grasped on the back of the driver's neck, still mashing his face into the window glass, and t OTHER hand still clamped over the second man's mouth. He plants both FEET on the steering wheel and `drives,' spin the wheel, sending the S.U.V. into... ...a ROLL.    The Escalade goes ENDO, SOMERSAULTING WILDL Suddenly, the ACTION BEGINS TO SLOW... The motorcycle RIDER tries to bail out. NO LUCK. The tumbling Escalade PLOWS RIGHT INTO him AND his bike. Parts scatter off the motorcycle, including its CHAIN. Th RIDER continues to SQUEEZE off ROUNDS as he goes FLYING. Inside the Escalade, Deadpool goes SPIN-CYCLE. The DRIVER flies through the sunroof, tearing out its remaining glas BLOOD spatters. The other man spits out the glowing CIGARETTE LIGHTER. The guy whose ankle is still tangled i the seat-belt FLAILS through the air like a rag-doll, AHA tied to MOBY DICK. The action CONTINUES to SLOW... until it FREEZES. The camera swoops in to Deadpool's face, upside down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shit.   Did I leave the stove on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

SPLAT... out of fra The RIDER's NECK is SLICED by the flying MOTORCYCLE CHAIN The DRIVER is half-way out the SUNROOF when the S.U.V. ro over him. SQUISH. The man who ate the CIGARETTE LIGHTER now eats pavement.

He walks quickly and purposefull towards a big plane in the center of the huge space: the BLACKBIRD, the X-Men's modified XR-71 jet transport. Struggling to keep up with the giant's long strides is a supernaturally CUTE, supernaturally DEADPAN 15-YEAR-OLD G in an X-MEN outfit. NEGASONIC TEENAGE WARHEAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've given Deadpool every chance to join us. And what is my reward? More immaturity and criminality! When will he finally grow up and see benefits of becoming X-Man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like... The house that blows up every few years? The fashion-forward jump-suits? I need to get myself kicked out of X- School.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I thought you were at top of class.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Was that sarcasm?    Awesome.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ate breakfast, yes? Breakfast is most important meal of day. (hands NTW a protein bar) Here. Protein bar, good for bones. Deadpool may try to break yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NTW shoves the bar in a pocket of her coat without breaki stride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The S.U.V. slides to a halt ON ITS SIDE, PASSENGER WINDOW UP. The rest of the CONVOY is forced to stop BEHIND. A BUNCH of MEN PILE OUT, each one carrying a BEASTLY GUN POINTING it STRAIGHT at the disabled S.U.V. The last noise is made by one final dislodged HUBCAP, whi rattles in little circles until it lies FLAT on the freew TWO SILENT BEATS. Then we hear the soft, ELECTRIC BUZZ of the Escalade's middle passenger window ROLLING DOWN. Up p the HEAD of DEADPOOL, like the GOPHER in Caddyshack. BANG BANG BANG BANG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, wait...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The head drops, the hands come up.        BANG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! You're probably wondering. Why the red suit? It's so bad guys can't see me bleed. This guy has the idea. He wore the brown pants. (to camera) All together now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The THUGS immediately OPEN FIRE. Deadpool is already leaping upward, flipping backwards, bullets tearing the air beneath him as he pulls out those MASSIVE .50 CAL PISTOLS... and in slo-mo, RETURNS FIRE. Deadpool keeps count of every bullet he fires:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

Deadpool TURNS to SPY a MOTORCYCLE RIDER BEARING DOWN ON This rider wears a distinctive SILVER HELMET. Deadpool raises BOTH pistols. This RIDER LEANS away, dodg each slug. First left, then right, then left.

dialogues.text: Nine.    Shit! Eight. Fuck! Seven.       Shit- fuck! The bike WHIZZES PAST safely, firing bullets, DEADPOOL follows, leaping high, flipping over the S.U.V. Then he scrambles AROUND the S.U.V., trying to close the distance to this guy through a WITHERING BARRAGE of fire. Another of the AK's slugs SLICES a swath out of the mask Deadpool's head, SINGING his hair.

dialogues.text: The MUZAC still plays. VANESSA smiles warmly/sadly at the little BOY, who is unwrapping his CHUPACHUP. Suddenly... a SCREAM and cries for help in Spanish. The NURSE and an ALARMED VANESSA rush toward the shouting.

dialogues.text: At last, WADE's fury has overcome his physical weakness. straddles the DOCTOR's CHEST. His expression is that of a man who's LOSING his SHIT. Wade RAISES THE SCALPEL, SLASHES at the doctor's throat, STABS him in the heart. The doctor writhes, spasms, gurgl and falls still. Chest heaving, Wade raises his head to see... at the FAR of the HALL: VANESSA - frozen, TERRIFIED. A blood-soaked Wade locks ey with her and swims back up into SANITY... `What have I do This is a horrific glimpse into Wade's murderous past... ...and the look on Vanessa's face is one of HORROR and PA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Awash in shame, Wade staggers to his feet, slips on chick blood, and LUNGES in the other direction. He hits the doo at the end of the hall at a RUN.

dialogues.speaker: STAB
dialogues.text: The sword, covered in BLOOD, penetrates the crayon drawin the recruiter on DEADPOOL's CORKBOARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Agent Smith.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool lasers in on AJAX's picture at the top of the pyramid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WADE leans against a wall, gasping for breath. He looks b toward her voice, face a mask of pain. Instead of seeking her... he melts into the busy street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DEADPOOL trudges to his FRONT DOOR.       He speaks to th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some kind of anger can't be managed. Like the kind where your year-long plan ends with the wrong guy getting dismembered! That said... when it comes time to licking wounds... there's no place like home, and I share that home with someone you met, the old blind lady from the laundromat, Al. She's like Robin to my Batman. Except she's old. And black. And blind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I think she loves me. Wait... pretty sure Robin loves Batman, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WADE, ghastly, nearing death, lies BACK onto a STRETCHER, covered only by a FLIMSY HOSPITAL GOWN. He's being wheele down a dim corridor by two tough-looking ORDERLIES. In one hand, he holds the recruiter's crumpled BUSINESS C In the other, he clutches the limited edition VOLTRON RIN as tight as his shaky hand allows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool     Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: They turn a corner and push through a pair of double door into a cavernous room. Wade looks around, full of hope fo new life. Immediately, every single thing he sees/hears begins to erode his confidence. The RECRUITER stands just inside the doors, smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Wilson! Nothing warms my heart like a change of someone else's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Walking into Wade's P.O.V. is the creepy RECRUITER. down on Wade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You finally hit `fuck-it.'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Worse.  Just promise you'll do right by me. So I can do right by someone else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, and please don't make my super suit green. Or animated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you enjoy your stay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The `Workshop,' as this old warehouse is affectionately called, has been converted into a working LABORATORY. Wade is wheeled through a vast room containing rows of individual `tents,' each containing a SUBJECT. Wade's eye DART to helpless SILHOUETTES. We hear WHISPERS, WHIMPERS, MOANS. A FELLOW PATIENT, a pathetic, terrified little man named CUNNINGHAM, is wheeled past Wade, restrained on another STRETCHER. Cunningham briefly locks eyes with Wade, but quickly moves on by. Wade can't help but be alarmed by the TERROR in Cunningha eyes. The tents are illuminated by BLINDING overhead lights. spies GRUESOMELY INTIMIDATING MEDICAL EQUIPMENT. Wade is wheeled into the tent that's his new home. The FIGURE who was pushing Wade DUMPS him onto a CHROME OPERA TABLE and roughly STRAPS him down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um.  My first request?    A warmer table. (shivers)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And warmer hands. Wade DOUBLE-TAKES at the sight of the figure above him: ANGEL DUST - thirties, female, tall, sexy, athletic - an Amazonian warrior in another age. Angel Dust wheels over a high-tech I.V. DRIP, complete wi glass cylindrical tanks housing a glowing, viscous LIQUID Then she roughly straps Wade's NECK to the table. Wade nearly GASPS, the color now officially drained from his f

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy!   Aren't you a little strong for a lady?   I'm calling wang.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'd like that, huh.    Welcome to our little hospital.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't look like a hospital. It looks like Chlamydia holding still. An UNLIT MATCHSTICK protrudes from Angel Dust's teeth - h idea of a TOOTHPICK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oral fixation?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut.   The fuck. Up. Angel Dust places a FINGER on Wade's FOREHEAD and SHOVES head back against the table - BANG - pinning it there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Patience, Angel. All in good time. Enter AJAX, whom we know as the PRISONER from the RAFT wi whom we've seen Deadpool tangle in the PRESENT. This is t first Ajax and Wade have met.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I expect turndown serv-? Ajax nods to Angel Dust. BOOM! She GAGS Wade with SURGICA TUBING, then wraps it around the TABLE, immobilizing his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a talker. Wade's eyes are wider than ever.    WTF?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (disarmingly matter-of-fact)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Wilson, my name is Ajax. I manage the Workshop. My `welcome' speech used to be full of euphemisms like `You may feel some discomfort.' But I've grown blunt. Ajax unsheathes an I.V. NEEDLE. Angel Dust up-tilts the table 45 degrees, then readies a holographic monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Workshop is not a government program. It's a private institution tasked with turning reclamation projects like yourself into men of extraordinary abilities. I'm about to remake your life. But if you think cancer cures painlessly, you're wrong. If you think super-human powers are acquired painlessly, you're wrong. Ajax touches Wade with the I.V. NEEDLE, pressing here and there, not QUITE hard enough to break skin. At last, he locates the subclavian vein. Wade flinches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're injecting you with a serum that activates mutant genes. For it to work, we need to subject you to extreme stress. The liquid glows FLUORESCENT through Wade's white skin as pumps into the pulmonary highway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've heard the whole make-an-omelette, break-some-eggs bit? (Wade blinks)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm about to hurt you, Wade. The kind of hurt I can't describe and you can't prepare for. It's cruel stuff. And there's no way out for you. No secret you can tell me. No soft spot in me to appeal to. Wade stares at them in shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool     Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What, you expected Weapon X? Ajax starts to TURN AWAY, but stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more thing. What's the ad? `I'm not just the president. I'm a client?' I've been through this procedure myself. It made me stronger. It also scorched my nerve endings. So I no longer feel pain. In fact... (smiles)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I no longer feel anything. Wade reacts by SAYING something - made UNINTELLIGIBLE by surgical tubing. Ajax nods to Angel Dust, who slices the SURGICAL TUBING, SNAPPING it away and FREEING Wade to TAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something in your teeth. Ajax smiles WITHOUT opening his mouth, signals Angel Dust She slams Wade's head back again as he turns to leave. Before he exits, Ajax hesitates, can't help but check his teeth in one of the surgical mirrors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Made you look! Hey, is Ajax your real name? `Cause it sounds suspiciously made up. What's it really? Steve? Mark? Trevor? Kyle? (E.T. voice)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elliot? We hear LAUGHS from nearby tents.      Wade is now playin audience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Joke away. The one thing that never survives this place is a sense of humor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll see!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Angel Dust)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All yours. We re-take WADE'S P.O.V. as Angel Dust, chewing her matchstick, re-enters frame above him, smiles, then punch him in the face. Black.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MONTAGE of Wade's treatments in the Workshop, set to th notes of JOHN DENVER's inspirational classic, `I WANT TO LIVE.' Juxtaposed with HARROWING VIGNETTES of Angel Dust AJAX experimenting on WADE... ...as he GASPS, CLAWS, SCREAMS BLOODY MURDER. Wade is DUNKED into thick, molasses-like LIQUID. PULLED a YANKED, POKED and PRODDED by contraptions that would have shamed the Spanish Inquisition. SAWED.   COMPRESSED.     SLICED.   DICED.   SLAP-CHOPPED. LONG SYRINGES PLUNGE DEEP INTO SOFT TISSUE. SCALPELS MAKE LONG INCISIONS.

dialogues.speaker: MINIATURE CIRCULAR SAWS SLICE THROUGH BONE.
dialogues.text: IV's PULL FLUIDS FROM THE BODY AND INSERT OTHER FLUIDS IN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to share what I can give.     I want to be... I want to live!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We also see SHORT, ULTRA-FAST MINI-MONTAGES of medical instruments, implying the PASSAGE of TIME.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over images of:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The serum I'm injecting you with targets any mutant genes lurking in your DNA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adrenaline acts as a catalyst for the serum, so we must subject you to extreme stress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're lucky, the mutant genes will activate and manifest in spectacular fashion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If not, we'll have no choice but to keep hurting you in new and different ways. Each more painful than the last.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Until you finally mutate.      Or die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At last, Wade is laid back down on his table, only now in QUIET DARKNESS, MEEK, WITHOUT ANY RESISTANCE whatever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puppies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the tent NEXT to Wade, CUNNINGHAM holds up his FIST to fabric. Wade can see it through the cloth in SILHOUETTE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It helps picturing puppies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade gives Cunningham a KNUCKLE BUMP through the fabric.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puppies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or kittens. If you swing that way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (chuckles) I swing both ways.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade swallows hard, grows serious:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But me, I've been making a list of things I still plan to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bucket list?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I prefer fuck-it list: Naked tandem base- jumping with the WNBA's Sacramento Monarchs... Sparking up a spliff with the Olympic torch...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finishing my Lego Millenium Falcon...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giving Meredith Baxter Birney a dutch oven...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Making my kids banana pancakes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the mouse ears? Creative, and delicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AJAX and ANGEL DUST enter CUNNINGHAM's tent and begin prepping him for a fresh round of torture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's OK, I encourage distractions. Can't have you giving up on us, can we now, you little worm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a VOICE calls out from the adjacent tent:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't take that shit, Cunningham! How tough can he be? Name like Francis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ajax is very subtly SURPRISED.      WHAT did Wade just sa is still strapped down inside.      Talking nice and LOUD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right! He got `Ajax' off a dish- washing liquid! (laughs from nearby tents) Legal name's Francis. F-R-A-N-C-I-oops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ajax has ENTERED Wade's tent. Ajax's expression tells us we need to know about the validity of Wade's claim. With as much freedom of motion as he has in one hand, Wad WAVES a STUB of PAPER at Francis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dry-cleaning tag, Francis.     Snagged it off your lab coat. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FYI. I may be able to get you the super- hero discount. CLOSE-UP on the tag, which reads `FREEMAN, FRANCIS.' Ajax stares hard at Wade with menacing eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are so relentlessly annoying. Shut the fuck up, or I'll sew that pretty mouth shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, I wouldn't do that. Here's the problem with round-the-clock torture. You can't really step it up from there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that what you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.   Francis.    That's what I think.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two ORDERLIES and ANGEL DUST finish strapping Wade down a attaching ELECTRODES to his head and chest. Wade is BOUND a HOSPITAL BED that's ENCASED in a large CAPSULE of PLEXIGLAS. The top half of the capsule is hinged to one side, OPEN, allowing Angel Dust access to Wade. Ajax sits eating a meal from some Tupperware in a nearby chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seems your genes are as stubborn as you. But we can still increase your suffering. We don't even have a name for this next toy. Various WIRES and TUBES run out of the capsule, connected OXYGEN TANKS, DIALS, and a MONITOR tracking BRAIN and HEA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We reduce the oxygen in the air to the exact point you feel like you're suffocating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool      Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you start to pass out, and your brain waves slow, we turn up the O2. If you catch your breath, and your heart rate slows, we turn it back down. And we leave you. Right. There.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um.   What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waterboarding is the most severe stress known to man. This device prolongs that stress. For hours, days, weeks...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Angel Dust chews her match and TAPS the capsule with a FINGER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or if you keep yapping, years...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I thought you were dicks before this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The saddest part? You still think we're making you a super-hero. You. Dishonorable discharge. Beating up pizza guys. Hip deep in hookers. You're nothing. I'd call you an asshole, but I'd have to answer to assholes. Little secret, Wade. The Workshop doesn't make super-heroes. It makes super-slaves. We're gonna fit you for a control collar and auction you to the highest bidder. (finishes meal, gets up) Who knows what they'll force you to do. Put down freedom fighters. Murder innocents. Or maybe just mow a lawn or two.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a brave face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ajax goes to close the lid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seriously. Now you do have something in your teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enjoy the weekend!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Ajax swings the capsule CLOSED and LOCKS it. The sound le away until all that's left is a HISSING SOUND as AJAX hit BUTTONS to lower O2 LEVELS. Wade's voice drops out as his breathing suddenly grows SH and SHALLOW. The oxygen dials fall. His HEART-RATE SOARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (chuckles)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks like a turd in a punch-bowl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (bright idea)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The `Punch-Bowl!' Wade fights off panic. His breaths become desperate GASPS There's not enough air to talk, or even SCREAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Night.   Eerily DARK, SILENT. An extreme CLOSE-UP of Wade's hand, nails clenched into t surface of whatever he's lying on. Is his skin... actuall

dialogues.speaker: BUBBLING
dialogues.text: Two MEN enter the tent and stand over the PUNCH-BOWL. CLICK. One of the men turns on a surgical light overhead, revealing himself to be a KINDLY-looking DOCTOR, avuncula thick glasses. Next to him is an ORDERLY. The doctor peer through the Punch-Bowl's lid. He is SURPRISED by what he sees. He nods to the orderly: `Go on, hurry.' The orderly quickly unlocks and unlatches the lid, then swings it OPEN. Air RUSHES INTO the PUNCH-BOWL. The order steps away, leaving the doctor alone in the room. WADE, hidden in darkness, gasps as though surfacing after being held underwater. The doctor casts a SHADOW over WADE's face inside. doctor is FASCINATED, ENLIVENED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Wilson... these results are remarkable. Wade takes deep LUNGS-FUL of AIR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your cancer cells are more aggressive than ever. Dividing and metastasizing at a fantastic rate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (broken, breathless) Yippee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But... the cells have inalterably changed. They're no longer destructive, but productive, selectively targeting and replacing damaged tissue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was a lot of... what's the word... syllables. Are you saying I'm better?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better than better.    A miracle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weak smile) My Mom used to call me that. (ALT:) Me and Jesus. (beat, to doctor) Thank you. I owe you my life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade grows choked up. The doctor is taken with empathy an affection. He tenderly brushes the hair off Wade's forehe of which the camera catches the tiniest glimpse. Wade's s is not RIGHT somehow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There. There. Your journey's been long and difficult. But you've become something extraordinary. Just rest now. Rest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doctor slowly exits.     Wade lies there.    Actually

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then, just when I thought I could breathe easy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who appears over the PUNCH-BOWL but... ...AJAX.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oo. Someone lost his shot at homecoming king.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You f-fucking sadistic-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Not fair. Everything I've done to you has been in your best interest. Even this next bit. You may be cured, but you still need to learn to be a better man. Polite. Respectful. What better way to teach you than to close this lid... and keep torturing you stupid. Ajax SLAMS the lid shut, LATCHES and LOCKS it. The hissin resumes. Wade's eyes grow wide. He starts to slip-slide toward absolute ANGUISH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you think I'm losing my marbles `cause I can't breathe. You're only half right. Ajax appears to be looking in at Wade. But we RACK FOCUS reveal he's looking at his REFLECTION in the Plexiglas li checking for stuff between his teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See, if Francis was able to see his reflection... The camera SWINGS around to Wade's POINT-OF-VIEW of Ajax through the glass lid, which has been newly ILLUMINATED b the surgical light above... ...and then RACKS FOCUS to WADE's REFLECTED FACE. Covered with HORRIFIC SCARS. Wade is no longer a handsome young m He is a monster. Which is perfectly visible to him one fo away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what they say. You always remember your first time. Wade throws back his head in a SILENT SCREAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even 5 years later...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back in the PRESENT, we find ourselves in a huge SCRAP-YA where various ships, planes, etc. are sold for scrap iron Among various vehicles is an OLD, BATTERED COMBAT CARRIER long given up for dead. A heavy truck navigates through the heaps of scrap-metal grinds to a stop in front of the carrier. Two heavyset MEN climb down and head toward the back of t truck, heave the heavy door open. AJAX and ANGEL DUST stand just inside, boxes and gear pil up behind them. They hop down as four more rough-looking pile out behind them. Angel Dust drags out a WOODEN CRATE. The planks crunch as she digs her fingers into the wood and heaves it up on on burly shoulder as if it weighed no more than a sack of fl Heavy AMMO peeks through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better to be the hunter than the hunted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ajax and Angel Dust walk across the muddy yard toward a service elevator bolted to the rusting hulk of the carrie

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Either I kill him, or he kills me.     Let's put him out of our misery...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DEADPOOL lays horizontal.     He is speaking to the AUDIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There... all caught up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He CLIMBS up and out of the GARBAGE TRUCK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (yells to driver) Thanks for the lift! Apologies if I bled in the recyclables.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mid-city DUPLEX. Borderline ghetto. Semi-furnished, `first apartment' quality: futons and torchiere lamps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Stained carpet, currently being swept by a roaming ROOMBA IKEA... everywhere. The same old AFRICAN-AMERICAN WOMAN we glimpsed early in movie - late 70's - purple floral dress - sits on a ratty couch, where the typical old woman might KNIT. Instead, this old woman uses a BOX-CUTTER to lay waste to BIG CARDBOARD BOX from IKEA - the `IVAR SHELVING UNIT.' She lays out its components and tools on a wobbly IKEA NO COFFEE TABLE... ...made more difficult by the fact that she is completely BLIND. This is Deadpool's roommate, BLIND AL. Suddenly, Blind Al's KEEN EAR picks up a faint, distant KNOCKING. She cocks her head to LISTEN.

dialogues.speaker: THE FRONT YARD
dialogues.text: Dirt. No grass. `93 Chevy Avon up on BLOCKS. An exhausted DEADPOOL is slumped against his own front door, red suit, mask, no right HAND. He is KNOCKING weakly on the door wi the SIDE of his HEAD.

dialogues.speaker: THE LIVING ROOM
dialogues.text: BLIND AL stands up in comfy creme nursing shoes. Grabs he red-tipped CANE. And shuffles toward the front door... ...when she is TRIPPED by the ROOMBA.        She FACE-PLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (from outside) Let's get ready to Rooooooomba!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under breath) Ass-hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Al SWINGS her cane angrily, again and again, trying to hi the robotic vacuum, which moves happily just out of reach She reaches her knees and stretches for the door when... ...DEADPOOL SPRINGS it open from outside, SLAMMING it int her HEAD. Blind Al goes down again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morning, roomie! (sniffs) This place reeks like old lady pants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (still supine) Yes. I'm old. I wear pants.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you're no lady.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blind Al struggles to a sitting position. Deadpool walks past her in his socks, drops his muddy BOOTS to the floor slips into a pair of POWDER-BLUE CROCS parked just inside door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So comfy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Upside of being blind:     I've never seen you in Crocs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean my big rubber masturbatin' shoes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes I know. Downside of being blind:        I hear everything in this duplex.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool walks bitterly past one wall of the DUPLEX, whic COVERED - WALL-to-WALL, FLOOR-to-CEILING, with CHRISTMAS ADVENT CALENDARS. Tons of ornaments/candies/etc. adorn the calendars. not ONE CALENDAR left uncovered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One-thousand eight-hundred twenty-two ornaments pinned to two-hundred-sixty calendars. All for a `Christmas' that... never... came!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too much naughty, too little nice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit on a stick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DEADPOOL SPLAYS OUT on a white futon, MOANING, nursing hi horrifying wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool      Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bactine?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (dripping sarcasm)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Bactine should do it. How's the Kullen coming? IKEA doesn't assemble itself. Blind Al sits back on the ratty couch and begins applying finishing touches to the shelving unit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're telling me. I don't mind the Kullen. It's an improvement on the Hurdal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything's an improvement on the Hurdal. I'd have taken a Hemnes... or even a Trysil... over the Hurdal. But I didn't get excited `til I saw the Kullen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Screw please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here? Now? Just kidding.          I know it's been decades for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'd be surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And totally grossed out! Blind Al turns the final screw, beyond unenthusiastic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ta.    Dah. The dresser look like the Leaning Tower of Piza in shitty particle board. Deadpool TOSSES a DIRTY MAGAZINE on top. The Kullen COLLAPSES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish I'd never heard of Craig's List.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I quote: `Looking for roommate. Blind to life's imperfections. Must be good with hands.' Or wouldya rather I build IKEA and you pay rent?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script     11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why such a douche this morning?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's recap. That cock-thistle who turned me into this freak... the one I've been waiting five years for... slipped through my arms today. Arm. Deadpool holds up his previously severed arm, which now h a little tweenage ARM emerging off it. Yes. Deadpool can GROW BACK LIMBS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Catching him was my only chance to be hot again. Get my super-sexy ex back. And stop the same shit from happening to anyone else. So yeah, things are pretty fucking scrumptious. Deadpool stands. Walks behind the couch, and as he passes the back of Blind Al's head... FARTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hash-tag Drive-by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to herself)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna find this `Craig.'        And I'm gonna kill him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once I've got the cure, I'm gonna do the same to Francis...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WADE, newly scarred, hidden in darkness, continues to GAS though being held underwater. Then the lid on the punch-b SLIDES BACK, revealing AJAX. Wade takes deep LUNGS-FUL of AIR. Ajax leans in for a closer look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bloody hell. Someone lost his shot at homecoming king.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (can barely speak)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What have you done to me?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You give me too much credit. This... this is the result of your genes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The punch bowl merely raised your stress to trigger the mutation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You... sadistic... fuck!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the gratitude?! You're cured! Your mutated cells can heal anything. They're attacking the cancer as fast as it can form. Your insides are a war zone. Not to mention your outsides!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade looks stunned as he struggles to process all this information. Ajax smiles down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've seen similar side-effects before.         I could cure them for you. But really, where's the fun in that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade says nothing, hating him but wanting to believe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to close this lid again.     Maybe you no longer need it. But I do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a long moment, Wade stares intensely at Ajax and sees nothing, a black hole of empathy. And he knows this is a who will never stop hurting him. ***NOTE: We will not be reshooting the rest of the scene below with the exception of the final shot.**** So he turns his gaze to the ceiling and WITHDRAWS into himself... the one place the cruelty can no longer reach Angel Dust enters, chewing on her usual matchstick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's all yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Angel leans over the Punch-bowl, starts to undo Wade's restraints.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You smell like shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When Angel Dust leans close to Wade's head he suddenly co alive and uses the strength he has left to HEAD-BUTT her the FOREHEAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script     11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (impressed) Whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Angel advances toward Wade.      Ajax stops her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, hey, alright. It's alright. I think he earned that one, yeah? You take off. Go on... off you go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Angel Dust EXITS the tent, she reaches to her mouth fo her matchstick... only it's not there. She frowns, fishes another match from her pocket, and tucks it between her l Ajax finishes strapping Wade back down and goes to close lid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One question. What's my name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade remains listless, mouth SHUT.       BLINKS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't think so.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ajax CLOSES and LOCKS the lid.      HISS.    The oxygen D

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, Francis. But my lips are sealed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then we're inside the punch bowl with Wade as the oxy levels drop and the suffering rises. Through a fog of mis Wade sees Ajax staring down, watching him, drinking in hi pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back in the Punch-Bowl, Wade OPENS his MOUTH... within wh he was HIDING a SINGLE MATCHSTICK, clenched carefully - d - between his teeth. He inhales... then SPITS OUT the match into his waiting P Finally, he STRIKES it against the side of the Punch Bowl Wade aims the now FLAMING match toward the tiny HOLE thro which OXYGEN flows. The match is quickly burning down. Wi it reach the hole before it snuffs out? At the last possible moment... ...the flame COMBUSTS the stream of oxygen, IGNITING it..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool     Final Shooting Script    11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: ...back through the TRANSPARENT PLASTIC TUBE that trails outside the Punch-Bowl. The flame SNAKES through the tube, this way and that, unt it reaches the OXYGEN TANK standing next to the Punch-Bow A beat. Then the TANK EXPLODES. The   BLOWS APART.      The hospital bed SNAPS in TWO. Out in the ward, the FIREBALL curls outward, spreading fr TENT to TENT. BOOM! BOOM! Other flammable tanks DETONATE. The tents GO UP like ROMAN CANDLES.        It's now MASS ALARMS BLARE.    Flames LEAP.     Smoke BILLOWS.     Pati A CURTAIN of FIRE suddenly DISPERSES, replaced by billowy WHITE SMOKE from an OVER-SIZED CHROME FIRE EXTINGUISHER.. ...held by AJAX, who STRIDES grimly toward Wade's tent. throws back the burning fabric... ...and nearly EATS an OXYGEN TANK.        He BLOCKS it at moment with his FIRE EXTINGUISHER.        CLANG. On the other end of the oxygen tank, WIND-MILLING it with unbridled FEROCITY, is WADE. WADE and AJAX SWING the oxygen tank and fire extinguisher like modern day CLUBS, trying to take off each other's he CLANG!   BANG!   BAM!    The tanks COLLIDE in mid-air. Ajax's fingers CRUNCH between metal.        He doesn't ev it. Wade grabs the HOSE of Ajax's fire extinguisher, angles i up, and gets his finger on the TRIGGER. The extinguisher BLASTS.      Ajax is momentarily BLINDED Wade brings the oxygen tank down like a LUMBERJACK'S AXE. Ajax BLOCKS it, but is driven to his KNEES. Wade's eyes are lit with fire. DOWN the tank COMES, again and AGAIN. Ajax takes his own fire extinguisher to the CH Then catches a BLOW from the oxygen TANK to his TEMPLE. The extinguisher goes FLYING. Wade swings the OXYGEN TANK AGAIN, but against all odds, AJAX CATCHES it and SLAMS it back into Wade's NOSE. CRUNCH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool     Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: Ajax rises to his feet, and the two grip OPPOSITE SIDES o the OXYGEN TANK, GRAPPLING with every ounce of strength. Wade sweeps Ajax's feet and he topples over backwards, Wa on top of him. Wade lifts the heavy tank and slams it int his face. Once. Twice. Three times. CRACK. As he's about to finish the job Ajax smiles, blood bubbli from his smashed lips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't kill me, Wade. I'm the only one who can fix that ugly mug. Wade looks torn as his rage gives way to something like h He tosses the tank away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then time to make me me again. A scream of terror behind Wade makes Wade turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade!   Help! Wade! Wade looks through the smoke and flame and spies a helple Cunningham lying in the flaming wreckage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck! Wade drops Ajax and SPRINTS to Cunningham, starts draggin the WRECKAGE trapping him, when... SLICE! A long piece of sheared REBAR THRUSTS CLEAN THROUGH his CHEST from BEHIND The force sends the spear DEEP into the wooden floor beam pinning Wade like an insect in an entomologist's display. In a grand display of strength, AJAX BENDS the end of the rebar to keep Wade pinned... then walks around and squats down into Wade's eye line, wearing a triumphant sneer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Say it.     `Francis.' Blood dribbles from Wade's mouth as he tries in vain to p himself off the bloody spike of metal. Ajax rises, scans burning workshop with a scowl - clearly a lost cause - an turns to leave. Cunningham screams again as the flames near him. Grunting with the pain and effort Wade tries to push himself off t spike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script      11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: His hands slip on the blood-slick metal, and he cannot fr himself. His VOLTRON RING lies on the floor next to him. Wade and Cunningham share a last look.          Cunningha jaws shut, fighting the agony. CREAK... CRACKLE... the ROOF COLLAPSES, BURYING BOTH OF T And we... CUT TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morning's first sunlight. WADE's VOLTRON RING lies COMPLETELY MELTED in the DEBRIS. The camera follows it to Wade's hand... then up his arm to his FACE. WADE's eyelids flutter, and he COMES TO. He is naked, his hospital gown burned away. We see BLACKENED SLUDGE, SOOT, charred remains. The melted and scorched metal rod next t him. Wade slowly realizes where he is and what happened. He reaches down to his stomach wound... WHICH HAS MIRACULOUS HEALED. Wade sits up, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't just get the cure to El CГЎncer. I got the cure to everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VANESSA, tired, broken, mind seemingly elsewhere, walks towards her apartment. She passes a loving young COUPLE, in-arm. Vanessa clocks this sadly, continues on. Behind her, PEOPLE walk to and fro.      Among them, we R WADE, dressed in ill-fitting pants and a hoodie. He is a TRAIN-WRECK, scarred face on display to the world for the first time. He looks purposeful, but tentative, walking behind Vaness GAINING on her. ANGLE ON:   WADE's P.O.V. A BOY goes by on his bike, trying hard not to gape. A TODDLER in a STROLLER looks up and BURSTS INTO TEARS. The toddler's MOTHER hustles past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alex, don't stare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VANESSA stops and rifles through her purse for keys. STILL on Wade's P.O.V. Wade stops, too, suddenly paralyze as the moment to face Vanessa arrives. As he hesitates, torn with anguish, the WHISPERS seem to grow, rising in volume until they become deafening:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, my, god, that is so fucking gnarly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just lost my appetite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade spins, trying to see where the voices are coming fro Nowhere... everywhere. The WHISPERS crescendo, now more i Wade's mind than in reality. He turns back to Vanessa, his face a mask of fear and pai just as she disappears into her apartment building. The closing glass door reveals his own HIDEOUS REFLECTION STA BACK AT HIM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the whole wide world, there's nothing as ugly... (beat) ...as fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gives up on his mission, backing away from his reflect Vanessa, his old life. He stumbles off the curb and into street, when... BAM! He is CRUSHED OUT OF FRAME by a SPEEDING BUS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THREE BODY BAGS lie on SLABS in a MORGUE. Without warning, the MIDDLE bag SITS UP STRAIGHT at the WAIST... ...then tries to CATERPILLAR its way to the edge of its slab...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script     11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: A43 CONTINUED
dialogues.text: ...but instead pitches off the slab - CRUNCH - FACE-FIRST onto the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An FBI-STYLE `ORGANIZATIONAL CHART' has been pinned on Wa CORKBOARD in the lair. A `pyramid' of baddies are linked strings. Each baddie is depicted not by a photograph, but child-like CRAYON DRAWING. Second from the top is the RECRUITER. At the APEX of the pyramid is AJAX HIMSELF. DEADPOOL, in his LAIR, sews together an early `proto- costume.' We see quick cuts of pieces of it going on: White Adidas track suit. White gloves.            White b some sort of white mask... A single gun, underarm holster, boot knife but no swords.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't make me ask twice.     Where's Francis?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DEADPOOL questions a bleeding thug, more bodies scattered across a floor littered with broken furniture behind him. Another thug rushes in and smashes a pool cue over Deadpo skull. Deadpool snatches the broken shaft of wood and PUN it into the thugs belly. A third thug staggers to his feet, pulls a pistol, fires multiple shots point blank. Deadpool staggers back, blood blossoming across his white suit.

dialogues.speaker: "CLICK"
dialogues.text: The thug stares in disbelief that Deadpool's still standi Deadpool looks down at the shaft of wood in his hand. Thinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool      Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said, where's... fucking... FR- (realizes) You made me ask twice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool spins the bloody cue with inhuman dexterity and starts towards the terrified thug, accidentally knocking a PITCHER of BLOODY MARY onto his already bloody stained suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck.   Me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DEADPOOL, TIDE STAIN-STICK in hand, tries unsuccessfully get the blood out of his white suit. We get our first glimpse of BLIND AL, who's sitting next Deadpool at the laundromat, completely unfazed by the bloodbath:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seltzer water and lemon for blood. (off Deadpool's impressed look, shrugs) Or wear red.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool's eyes light up. He crumples this suit into a ba and tosses it into a trash bin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool stabs a KNIFE into the picture of the GOON he ju killed (at the bottom of the pyramid)... right in the FOREHEAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DEADPOOL's at the sewing machine again. Quick cuts of a RED `proto' outfit going on: Cheap red sweats. Red gloves. Red converse. As yet unseen RED MASK, which turns out to be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...a RED `LUCHA LIBRE' PRO WRESTLING MASK. Deadpool stands in the shadows of a dingy basement, low ceilings, walls stacked high with cases of liquor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool     Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: VG44 CONTINUED
dialogues.text: In a BOXING RING at the center of the room two WOMEN poun each other surrounded by a scrum of a CROWD. Deadpool spi his mark in a dirty white suit pressed in tight ringside. Deadpool pulls his mask down, wades into the crowd, throw men aside, PLOWING toward his target. The mark sees Deadpool at the last second, turns as a KAT flashes out and skewers his hand, pinning it to the wall. Deadpool fires a couple shots into the ceiling, sending t rest of the crowd rushing for the exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't make me ask twice.      Where's-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool has a goon at sword-point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Donde esta Francisco?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't speak Spanish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sighs) And I don't have time for you to learn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool kills the thug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take me to your leader. (turns) I've always wanted to say that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Squeal.     Like a pig. Where's Francis?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In no particular order. Where's your boss? And where can I find good Indian food?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why the red suit?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's so bad guys can't- never mind, they've already heard that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're about to tell me everything you know about Francis Freeman. Known aliases. Current whereabouts. Boxers or briefs. Go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (forces guy's mouth open, goes in with knife) Open your mouth. Here comes the airplane!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gun pointed at forehead, a la Joseph Takagi) I don't know, I'm telling you. You're just going to have to kill me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK. (shoots goon in head, a la Hans Gruber, then, to audience:) Right?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (goon at knifepoint) Don't make me break out the Collective Soul CDs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You give me your boss.     I give you the rest of your life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (throws woman onto table) I don't feel good about myself.     But where is he? I'm so sorry.

dialogues.speaker: VARIOUS
dialogues.text: New COSTUME.     BOOM.   A MAN dies. STAB.    His picture is knifed. BOOM.    STAB. QUESTIONS.

dialogues.speaker: BOOM
dialogues.text: DEADPOOL questions more and more thugs, each bit of information bringing him closer.... Soon there is a FOREST of knives sticking from the board. ...and only the RECRUITER and AJAX are left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A wretched room, dirty mattresses covering the floor. Dim light scatters through a tangle of IV bags hastily strung over MEN too poor to have anywhere else to go and die. The RECRUITER kneels, speaking quietly to a particularly hardened patient. He places a card in the man's emaciated hand, then stands and walks toward a low doorway. The recruiter enters a brightly lit room stacked high wit bags of rice. Two heavily armed THUGS fall in beside him. The men scan the aisles as they move toward a door leadin out into an alley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Smith!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They turn to see DEADPOOL, high atop a stack of rice bags

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, right?! I look like a million bucks. (turns to camera)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Literally - this suit cost Fox a million dollars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Without a word, the Recruiter flees, running through the roll-up door. Deadpool leaps to land between the two bodyguards as they draw their weapons and spray the room with gunfire. One goes down in a bloody heap. Deadpool leaps toward the other, skewers him with both swords. The thug falls backward, dead before he hits the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come out, come out, wherever you are! (darkens) Don't make me ask tw- (pleasantly surprised) Good for you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Recruiter has stepped timidly from between overflowin garbage bins, hands raised, eager to talk his way out of mess:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To whom should I address my... desperate bargaining?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't recognize the voice? Maybe the resumГ©: Forty-one confirmed kills. Make that Eighty-nine. Seven the past week alone. Same rate most folks... (pulls out SWORD) ...get a shave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (realizes who it is, fights to stay composed) Mr... Wilson?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ding-ding-ding! Now... you're about to tell me where I can find your boss. Or I'm gonna make you feel worse. Wait...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool brings the sword closer to the recruiter's face. Turns to CAMERA:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...worse than worse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I pride myself on being persuasive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WADE stands in the shadows.      WEASEL sits at a table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... no way! I'm not making her life as ugly as mine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, you can't look that bad! It's like that blemish no one notices but you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong. I'm a monster, inside and out. I belong in a circus, the kind that rolls around Eastern Europe in covered wagons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't envision a scenario where Vanessa won't take you ba- (Wade steps into light, takes off his hoodie) -aaaaaccckkk!! Holy shit. You... are... terrifying. You look like an avocado had sex with an older avocado.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade grabs the bottle of JACK DANIELS from the table, GUZZLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We might have to move our relationship to text and phone only.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade ignores Weas, slams down the bottle:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the only guy who can fix this fugly mug, the asshole who ran that mutant factory, escaped to who knows where.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I take back the Vanessa thing.      You have only one option.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find Francis-Go-Fuck-Himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script    11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (not listening) Star in low budget horror movies. Seriously, you look like Freddy Krueger face-fucked a topographical map of Utah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (equally not listening) I'm gonna work my way through his crew... crushing bad guys' skulls, `til one of `em leads me to Francis. Then I'll force him to cure this face. Stomp his bloody guts into a fine vintage. And win Vanessa back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK. Not exactly the plot of Beauty and the Beast, but cool. Good news, that douche thinks you're dead. Advantage you. He won't think you're coming. Bad news, with a puss like that, you'll be spotted fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (derisive) So what do you suggest?     A mask?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not a bad idea! You... are... haunting. Your face is the stuff of nightmares.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nods) Like a testicle with teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How `bout a super-suit? And a nickname! Bitter-Boy. Super-Fist. Captain Never- Die. (deflates at a thought)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing. It's just... you know, I just realized, I'm never winning the-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weasel looks over to Wade, sees him staring.          He Wade's gaze up to the board on the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: RS44 CONTINUED
dialogues.text: As Wade says the word, he and Weasel share a look. Wade holds up the BOTTLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool.    To you, Mr. Pool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two CLINK GLASSES.

dialogues.speaker: DAY/NIGHT
dialogues.text: A highly pleased DEADPOOL holds up the-soon-to-become-fam MASK for the first time, ushering in... a MONTAGE: WADE, at SISTER MARGARET's, receives a YELLOW CARD with a Cypress Tree from WEASEL. He turns a LUCHA LIBRE mask INSIDE OUT to reveal the clas DEADPOOL MASK we all know and love. Puts it on. Then dresses - piece-by-piece - in the RED UNIFORM we've come know and love. And at last, UNSHEATHES A KATANA. The swor TWIRLS, SLASHES, LUNGES into shadow. A HANDKERCHIEF WIPES BLOOD from the BLADE. The katana gets SHEATHED again. The same yellow card is now RECEIVED and PUNCHED by Wease Wade is paid in TWENTY DOLLAR BILLS. WHIP CREAM froths on a shot glass. A BLOW-JOB is TOSSED BACK. Meanwhile, VANESSA plays SKEE-BALL wistfully by herself a the ARCADE: SKEE-BALLS roll into HOLES. LIGHTS FLASH. TICKETS CHURN OUT. They slam into the twisted metal railings at the bottom o the deck and hang there. Deadpool swings by one hand and stares at the scrapyard below. Huge chunks of metal slide and smash past to tumble to the ground a hundred feet bel Vanessa hangs onto Deadpool for dear life, her eyes locke his...

dialogues.text: Sorry. It's just. All this time, you bought that I have the cure? I'm flattered. But do I really look like the scientist type? You want the guy behind the guy. His name's Dr. Killebrew. And he's long gone. Who knows where.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um.    What?

dialogues.text: You heard me.

dialogues.text: You mean to say, after five long years, I've been chasing the wrong monkey?

dialogues.text: Sounds even stupider when you say it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like the kind of stupid who admits he can't do the one thing I'm keeping him alive for? (chambers a round)

dialogues.text: Any last words? Good. I got one: (pulls back the hammer)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Francis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wade! Deadpool turns to see Colossus, hands on hips, looking ex HEROIC. NEGASONIC TEENAGE WARHEAD is STANDING at his SIDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four or five moments.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool     Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four or five moments.      That's all it takes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be a hero. Everyone thinks it's a full time job. Wake up a hero. Brush your teeth a hero. Go to work a hero. Not true. Over a lifetime, there are only four or five moments that really matter. Moments when you're offered a choice. To make a sacrifice. Conquer a flaw. Save a friend. Spare an enemy. Deadpool continues to hold the pistol to Ajax's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In those moments, everything else falls away. The way the world sees us. The way we see oursel- BOOM!   OFF-SCREEN, A GUNSHOT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (dry-heaves again)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huuugglh! Why! REVERSE ANGLE to Deadpool, who's just shot AJAX in the he with Blind Al's SATURDAY NIGHT SPECIAL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were droning on! (shrugs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I may be stuck looking like pepperoni flatbread, but at least we've heard the last of him. If wearing super-hero tights means sparing psychopaths, maybe I wasn't meant to wear `em. Not everyone monitors a hall like you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just promise-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be on the lookout for the next four moments.
