dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (peers between Colossus and NTW)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now if you'll excuse me. I'm just a boy... about to stand in front of a girl... and tell her- what the fuck am I gonna tell her?! CUT TO: Deadpool's P.O.V. BETWEEN Colossus and NTW of VANESSA, who's now walking quickly TOWARD him. She brushe between the two X-men and without saying a word, GRABS th fallen PISTOL and PUMPS TWO EXTRA BULLETS into Ajax's cor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (bang)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gratuitous. (bang)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Worth it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to camera)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyone else turned on? (to Vanessa)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I love about y- Vanessa promptly PUNCHES Deadpool in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I totally deserved that! (gets punched again)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That too! (wards off knee)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe not the nethers. Vanessa restrains herself, then TURNS HER BACK, overcome.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Start talking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry. For leaving. And taking so long to cowboy up. It's been a rough few years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (snorts, dismissive)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rough?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I live in a crack house. With a family of twelve. At night, we spoon for warmth. Everyone fights for Noelle. She's the fattest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's nothing we don't share.    Floor space. Dental floss. Condoms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you live in a house! (turns to face him)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I woulda found you before now. But the guy behind this mask isn't the same guy you remember.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean this mask? Deadpool FLINCHES but doesn't STOP Vanessa from slowly, gently taking OFF his mask, revealing underneath... HUGH JACKMAN's `SEXIEST MAN ALIVE' People MAGAZINE COVER. Bloo at the pierce points. Mouth/eyes cut out to make a `mask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And this one. In case the other fell off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean like this? Vanessa starts PULLING OUT staples.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oo. Ah.    Quicker - like a Bandaid!    Owww- di 5000. One last staple remains.   Vanessa hesitates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure I'm sure. She PULLS it out. The photo FALLS, revealing DEADPOOL's SCARS. And two vulnerable, misty eyes. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ew.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (devastated)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script     11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kidding! Get over yourself!        I'd hit that shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You already did. (rubs chin)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twice. Seriously?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (nods)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After a brief adjustment period and one or two drinks. (smiles)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a face... I'd be happy to sit on. Vanessa hooks Deadpool's PINKIE with HERS, PULLS him in t kiss him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm also not the same under these pants. (whispers)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Super-penis. Deadpool and Vanessa are ABOUT to kiss when...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 1975 called. Deadpool realizes COLOSSUS and NTW are still standing WATCHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It wants its peep show back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gah! What the hell are you two still doing here?! (to Colossus)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You, go clean some chalk-board erasers, or be a... really Big Brother, or teach fat kids to eat lettuce. (to NTW)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you, Chicken Noodle. Well... (freezes)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I feel something stupid coming on. (bounces)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gaaaaaaahhhhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool    Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's alright. (beat, tiniest of smiles)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (STARES, elated)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am?! Omigod. That. Was. Not. Mean! Seriously, guys, it was a pleasure. For a second there, we felt like... like... (we expect `family')

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...five mini lion robots forming a large super robot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's the stupid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, I meant it, both of you, fire up the Blackbird and shoo! Scram! Vamoose! Skedaddle! Don't make me keep thinking of these! They smile, shake their heads, and walk off. Deadpool turns back to Vanessa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where were we, darlin'? Oh, riiight. The best part. Deadpool KISSES Vanessa. The little kiss become a BIGGER ONE. Then... fading up from nowhere, with a slightly tinn quality... we hear WHAM!'s `CARELESS WHISPER.' Vanessa pu back, puzzled. Deadpool raises his ANDROID. On the cracke and dirty screen, George's and Andrew's FACES beam from Wham!'s `MAKE IT BIG' album cover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `Wham!'    As promised. The two share the longest kiss yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See, life can smell like Daffodil Daydream. So if you're sitting out there in your own personal Punch-Bowl. Ms. Mama June on your tongue. Find someone to hold... and someone to hold on to you. Life's next little train wreck...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ..will be so much easier if you do. We find ourselves in a newer, spiffier version of the WORKSHOP, where a LAB TECHNICIAN is strapping down a new sickly VOLUNTEER/VICTIM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which brings us to shittiest moment number 1! The guy behind the guy, Dr. Killebrew, off scot-free. A SILHOUETTED FIGURE approaches the bed of the nervous volunteer, who smiles weakly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you make me better? REVERSE ANGLE to reveal whom he's talking to: the PUDGY,

dialogues.speaker: KINDLY-LOOKING DOCTOR WHO STROKED WADE'S HEAD IN THE
dialogues.text: WORKSHOP. He smiles, pats the volunteer's wrist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better than better.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But let's look on the bright side. (sniffs)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You smell what I smell? I mean besides stale popcorn and my post-fight man-funk? Dr. Killebrew holds up a syringe with a glint in his eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sequel. Maybe even one of those ensemble team movies...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DEADPOOL and Vanessa MAKE OUT LIKE CRAZY, LONG AND HARD. slowly PULL BACK until they look SMALL against the topple hulk of the COMBAT CARRIER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, `til next time, this is your friendly neighborhood pool guy saying... I'm never gonna dance again... the way I danced with you. WHAM BELTS OUT `CARELESS WHISPER' as we ROLL CREDITS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deadpool   Final Shooting Script   11/16/15

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hallway of a suburban home.    DEADPOOL enters in a mar and gray striped robe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (short version)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're still here? It's over! Go home. Wait... you expected a tease for Deadpool 2?! Sorry, we're low on dough. But if you can keep a secret, I can tell you who's gonna be in it. Cable! Someone suggested Mel Gibson for the role, buuuut- I was thinking Liam Neeson. Only problem, Liam likes to get paid. And more for Liam means less for me. Maybe we'll crowdfund the shit. Just you and me, kids. Shalom!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (long version)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're still here? It's over! Go home. Wait... you expected a tease for Deadpool 2?! Maybe a little Samuel L. Jackson? Sorry, that budget went to Weasel's Ketamine habit. But if you can keep a secret, I can tell you who's gonna be in it. Cable! You're allowed to show your pleasure. I'd love Liam Neeson for the role, but Liam likes to get paid. And more for Liam means less for me. So we'd best crowdfund the shit. Depending on your level of giving, you could receive a Colossus-brand desktop steel-ball clacker, a Dwayne `The Rock' Johnson real doll, or four minutes alone in a room with Charlie Sheen.   Donate now! And shalom!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a la Ferris)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boom, boom, chicka chickah...
